plot: Simon Butteriss explores the life and work of Oliver Goldsmith, writer of the ever popular play "She Stoops to Conquer".
title: A Gooseberry Fool: Oliver Goldsmith Stoops to Conquer
plot_es: Simon Butteriss explores the life and work of Oliver Goldsmith, writer of the ever popular play "She Stoops to Conquer".
original_name: A Gooseberry Fool: Oliver Goldsmith Stoops to Conquer
plot_en: Simon Butteriss explores the life and work of Oliver Goldsmith, writer of the ever popular play "She Stoops to Conquer".
